    • Uses of Operation in gaffer.accumulostore.operation.hdfs.operation

      Classes in gaffer.accumulostore.operation.hdfs.operation that implement Operation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ImportAccumuloKeyValueFiles 
      class  SampleDataForSplitPoints
      The SampleDataForSplitPoints operation is for creating a splits file, either for use in a SplitTable operation or an AddElementsFromHdfs operation.
      class  SplitTable
      The SplitTable operation is for splitting an accumulo table based on a sequence file of split points.

    • Uses of Operation in gaffer.accumulostore.operation.impl

      Classes in gaffer.accumulostore.operation.impl that implement Operation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GetEdgesBetweenSets
      Given two sets of EntitySeeds, called A and B, this retrieves all Edges where one end is in set A and the other is in set B.
      class  GetEdgesInRanges<SEED_TYPE extends Pair<? extends ElementSeed>>
      Returns all Edge's between the provided ElementSeeds.
      class  GetEdgesWithinSet
      Returns Edges where both ends are in a given set.
      class  GetElementsBetweenSets<ELEMENT_TYPE extends Element>
      Given two sets of EntitySeeds, called A and B, this retrieves all Edges where one end is in set A and the other is in set B and also returns Entitys for EntitySeeds in set A.
      class  GetElementsInRanges<SEED_TYPE extends Pair<? extends ElementSeed>,ELEMENT_TYPE extends Element>
      This returns all data between the provided ElementSeeds.
      class  GetElementsWithinSet<ELEMENT_TYPE extends Element>
      Retrieves Edges where both ends are in a given set and/or Entitys where the vertex is in the set.
      class  GetEntitiesInRanges<SEED_TYPE extends Pair<? extends ElementSeed>>
      This returns all Entity's between the provided ElementSeeds.
      class  SummariseGroupOverRanges<SEED_TYPE extends Pair<? extends ElementSeed>,ELEMENT_TYPE extends Element>
      A SummariseGroupOverRanges operation will return an Element that represents the aggregated form of all data between the provided range for the provided group.

    • Uses of Operation in gaffer.operation

      Subinterfaces of Operation in gaffer.operation 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  GetElementsOperation<SEED_TYPE,RETURN_TYPE>
      A GetElementsOperation defines a seeded get operation to be processed on a graph.
      interface  GetIterableElementsOperation<SEED_TYPE,RETURN_TYPE>
      A GetIterableElementsOperation defines a seeded get operation to be processed on a graph, resulting in an Iterable of Element objects.
      interface  GetIterableOperation<SEED_TYPE,RETURN_TYPE>
      A GetIterableOperation defines a seeded get operation to be processed on a graph.
      interface  GetOperation<SEED_TYPE,RETURN_TYPE>
      A GetOperation defines a seeded get operation to be processed on a graph.
      interface  Validatable<OUTPUT>
      A Validatable operation defines an operation with an iterable of Elements that can optionally be validated before being processed.
      interface  VoidInput<OUTPUT>
      An VoidInput operation has no input.
      interface  VoidOutput<INPUT>
      An VoidOutput operation has no output.

    • Uses of Operation in gaffer.operation.impl

      Classes in gaffer.operation.impl that implement Operation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CountGroups
      A CountGroups operation takes in Elements and collects counts for the number of entity and edge groups used.
      class  Deduplicate<T>
      A Deduplicate operation takes in an Iterable of items and removes duplicates.
      class  Limit<T>
      A Truncate operation takes in an Iterable of items and limits the iterable to a given number of items.
      class  Validate
      A Validate operation takes in Elements validates them using the store schema and returns the valid Elements.

    • Uses of Operation in gaffer.operation.impl.add

      Classes in gaffer.operation.impl.add that implement Operation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AddElements
      An AddElements operation is a Validatable operation for adding elements.

    • Uses of Operation in gaffer.operation.impl.export

      Classes in gaffer.operation.impl.export that implement Operation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ExportOperation<INPUT,OUTPUT> 
      class  FetchExport
      A FetchExport fetches an export Iterable for a provided key.
      class  FetchExporter
      A FetchExporter fetches the Exporter containing the export information.
      class  FetchExporters
      A FetchExporters fetches all Exporters containing the export information.
      class  UpdateExport
      A UpdateExport allows the results of a previous operation in an OperationChain to be added to a export, keyed on an optional key.

    • Uses of Operation in gaffer.operation.impl.generate

      Classes in gaffer.operation.impl.generate that implement Operation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GenerateElements<OBJ>
      An GenerateElements operation generates an CloseableIterable of Elements from an CloseableIterable of objects.
      class  GenerateObjects<ELEMENT_TYPE extends Element,OBJ>
      An GenerateObjects operation generates an Iterable of objects from an Iterable of Elements.

    • Uses of Operation in gaffer.operation.impl.get

      Classes in gaffer.operation.impl.get that implement Operation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GetAdjacentEntitySeeds
      An GetAdjacentEntitySeeds operation will return the EntitySeeds at the opposite end of connected edges to a seed EntitySeed.
      class  GetAllEdges
      Restricts GetAllElements to only return edges.
      class  GetAllElements<ELEMENT_TYPE extends Element>
      Extends GetElements, but fetches all elements from the graph that are compatible with the provided view.
      class  GetAllEntities
      Restricts GetAllElements to only return entities.
      class  GetEdges<SEED_TYPE extends ElementSeed>
      Restricts GetElements to only return Edges.
      class  GetEdgesBySeed
      Restricts GetEdges to match seeds that are equal.
      class  GetElements<SEED_TYPE extends ElementSeed,ELEMENT_TYPE extends Element>
      Restricts AbstractGetOperation to take ElementSeeds as seeds and returns Elements There are various flags to filter out the elements returned.
      class  GetElementsBySeed<SEED_TYPE extends ElementSeed,ELEMENT_TYPE extends Element>
      Restricts GetElements to match seeds that are equal.
      class  GetEntities<SEED_TYPE extends ElementSeed>
      Restricts GetElements to only return Entitys.
      class  GetEntitiesBySeed
      Restricts GetEntities to match seeds that are equal.
      class  GetRelatedEdges<ELEMENT_SEED extends ElementSeed>
      Restricts GetEdges to match seeds that are related.
      class  GetRelatedElements<SEED_TYPE extends ElementSeed,ELEMENT_TYPE extends Element>
      Restricts GetElements to match seeds that are related.
      class  GetRelatedEntities<ELEMENT_SEED extends ElementSeed>
      Restricts GetEntities to match seeds that are related.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AddElementsFromHdfs
      An AddElementsFromHdfs operation is for adding Elements from HDFS.
      class  MapReduceOperation<INPUT,OUTPUT>
      The MapReduceOperation operation is the base operation that should be extended for any Operations that run map reduce jobs.
